title: A Century of Progress
description: For centuries two meg-powers from the future have been waging war for control of timelines of history. Alan Norlund, a WWII airman vet, is promised a life saving cure for his granddaughter, if he will undertake a mission fifty years back in time to the 1933 Chicago World's Fair. Hitler with his 'angels' from the opposing power would like to take over our timeline and 1933 Chicago may be just the place to start.	Continuing the time-line wars of Fred Saberhagen's MASK OF THE SUN.
author: Fred Saberhagen
